predicate.note: Frames file for 'attribute' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus and comparison with 'give' (really!)

roleset.name: assign attribute to

example.name: typical usage
example.text: Mr. Hahn attributes the gains to the philosophy of concentrating on what a company knows best.
example.arg: the philosophy of concentrating on what a company knows best.

roleset.note: This might be the only verb (so far) where the attribute comes before the entity with the attribute. Curious.
